name: opnvote-verifier
description: CLI tool to decode and verify opnVote ballots

scripts.compile: npm run build && bun build dist/decodeBallot.js --compile --outfile opnvote-verifier
scripts.compile:linux: npm run build && bun build dist/decodeBallot.js --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile build/opnvote-verifier-linux-x64
scripts.compile:macos: npm run build && bun build dist/decodeBallot.js --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile build/opnvote-verifier-macos-x64
scripts.compile:macos-arm: npm run build && bun build dist/decodeBallot.js --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile build/opnvote-verifier-macos-arm64
scripts.compile:windows: npm run build && bun build dist/decodeBallot.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile build/opnvote-verifier-windows-x64.exe
scripts.compile:all: npm run build && npm run compile:linux && npm run compile:macos && npm run compile:macos-arm && npm run compile:windows

author: j0xn
